source.name: IDOL 2013 Registered Day and Temporary Labor Agencies
source.description: It is unlawful under the Day and Temporary Labor Services Act, 820 ILCS 175, to operate an agency without registering with the Department and for third party clients to use an unregistered agency. Third party clients have an obligation to verify an agency is registered by checking when it enters into a contract and on March 1 and September 1 of each year. Agencies and third party clients are held responsible for complying not only with the registration requirements but the specific record keeping requirements of the Act.
